channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Malaysia 2021
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Malaysia 2021 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 12 August 2021 at 10:00.

item.description: The laws of attraction: Economic drivers of inter-regional migration, housing costs and the role of policies by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 13 August 2021 at 7:00.

item.title: The economic costs of restricting international mobility
item.description: The economic costs of restricting international mobility by Economics Department has an embargo on Friday 13 August 2021 at 7:00.
